resources.string: BlackScot is reducing the power usage of your screen by overlapping black pixels on the unused parts of the display.\n\nFor this to work, you will be prompted next to grant the \'display over other apps\' permission.
Please grant the \'display over other apps\' permission, so that BlackScot can start conserving battery power.
BlackScot is now active.\nTap here or any black area to continue the tutorial.
Any tap on black will move the viewport there.\nGive it a try, tap the black!
You can interact with the screen, through the viewport, as usual.\nContinue with a tap on any black!
Control the viewport height and the black opacity from the settings.\nTap the black!
Stop BlackScot at any time with a tap on \'X\'.\nNow tap the black!
Please send any suggestion of improvement using Google Play reviews.\nEnjoy! Over and tap out!
